actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Target grappled (escape DC 16) and restrained; octopus can't use tentacles on another target while grappling.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: While underwater, creates a 20-foot-radius heavily obscured ink cloud for 1 minute (dispersed by strong current); after releasing, can Dash as a bonus action.
